summary: This Mod hopes to bring arena into the engine of skyrim
descriptionHtml:
You may know of the elder scrolls renewal project. A group of dedicated modders attempting to re-create the games Morrowind and Oblivion in skyrim`s far superior engine by use of mods (Skywind and Skyblivion respectively). While progress on these is going brilliantly, and their work is an inspiration to us all, I believe that the first in the series, arena, also deserves such treatment.Â 
Though this mod is little more than a dream at this time, I and a few trusted friends who share my opinions have begun our work. But we alone cannot manage this massive project. WE NEED YOU!! Anyone who wishes to contribute to this project need only to reply to one of the topics in the comments with a basic application, whatever you can do will be appreciated.
author: HARVEH
